member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifClass
member.summary: Dissects a GIF image into its component parts.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.AnimatedGifs.buildToStream(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.IO.Stream,ImageResizer.ResizeSettings)
member.summary: We cannot fix buildToBitmap, only buildToStream

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.AnimatedGifs.getById(System.Drawing.Imaging.PropertyItem[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the first PropertyItem with a matching ID

member.name: T:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifCreator
member.summary: Provides methods for creating application and graphics blocks needed to write a animated Gif.

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifCreator.CreateGraphicControlExtensionBlock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Written before each frame - specifies the frame's delay and the index of the transparent color (0)

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifCreator.CreateGraphicControlExtensionBlock(System.Int32,System.Byte)
member.summary: Written before each frame - specifies the frame's delay and the index of the transparent color

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifCreator.CreateLoopBlock
member.summary: Creates a Loop Block (Netscape appliation extension) for infinite looping. Written after the last frame's image data

member.name: M:ImageResizer.Plugins.AnimatedGifs.GifCreator.CreateLoopBlock(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a Loop block for the specified number of repeats. Written after the last frame's image data. Do NOT call this if numberOfRepeatings=1. IE and FF < 3 (incorrectly) loop infinitely when loops=1. Simply omit the extension in that case.
